gov.anl.ipns.Util.Sys
Class SaveDocToFileListener

java.lang.Object
  gov.anl.ipns.Util.Sys.SaveDocToFileListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class SaveDocToFileListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener

Pops up a file dialog so the filename can be selected. Then saves the contents of the PlainDocument doc to this file. Other features include

  • to notify listeners of a new filename
  • also listen for a new "current filename"
  • The current filename appears in the pop up file dialog box.
  • As a PropertyChange Listener, this class only listens for the property with the name "filename". The New Value is the new filename.

SaveDocToFileListener

public SaveDocToFileListener(javax.swing.text.Document doc,
                             java.lang.String filename)
Constructor that sets the document that will be saved when triggered by an event

Parameters:
doc - the file whose contents will be saved
filename - sets the filename and directory in the pop up file dialog box

SaveDocToFileListener

public SaveDocToFileListener(javax.swing.text.Document doc,
                             java.lang.String filename,
                             java.beans.PropertyChangeListener FilenameListener,
                             java.lang.String FilenamePropertyName)
Constructor that sets the document that will be saved when triggered by an event. It also
  • adds one PropertyChangeListener
  • Allows a different property name to be sent when notifying the listener about the changed filename

Parameters:
doc - the file whose contents will be saved
filename - sets the filename and directory in the pop up file dialog box
FilenameListener -
    Listener for a new filename that saved a doc or null if none
FilenamePropertyName -
    The property name sent to Listener when notifying about the new filename
Method Detail

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
Stores the doc to the file selected and notifies any listeners of the filename that was used to store the file

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

propertyChange

public void propertyChange(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
This method is invoked when a PropertyChange event is triggered and an instance of this class was added as a listener. The filename that appears when the pop up file dialog box appears is set by this method if the Property Name was "filename".

Specified by:
propertyChange in interface java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
Parameters:
evt - the Property Change event

setFileName

Parameters:
Filename - the currently selected file

getFileName

public java.lang.String getFileName()
Returns the last selected filename.

addPropertyChangeListener

public void addPropertyChangeListener(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
This method is used to add a Listener who will be notified when a file is saved.

Parameters:
listener - The Object listening for a saved filename
